did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, course material, meeting minutes, and subject files.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor emeritus of food science, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, course material, meeting minutes, and subject files.
